name: Consumer Association the Quality of Life
legal: Non profit Association according to Civil Greek law and Consumer Association according to Consumer Protection Law
goal:
Consumers’ Association the Quality of Life- EKPIZO was established in 1988 aiming at protecting consumer rights, improving their quality of life and bringing them into action. It is a non-governmental, non-profit organization according to Civil Law and in addition, a Consumer Association according to Consumer Protection Law.
Since 1988, we have defended every day our rights as consumers. We seek accurate and timely information and for everyone, to realize the power we have as consumers to achieve a balanced and fairer market that: prioritizes the provision for our needs over the reckless pursuit of maximum profit; respects the legislation, our rights as consumers, our dignity, the environment, the general human values; proves that it understands its responsibility for our health and safety; operates based on the principle of transparency and seeks to gain our trust through good practices and not by hiding the truth behind misleading information campaigns.
Although we run the risk of being characterized as utopians, we envision a certain type of society. This society, above all, will serve our needs, will ensure our prosperity, will be fair towards us, will treat us equally, excluding nobody, will inspire creativity and solidarity and will care for the environment and for future generations.
We have 23.757 individual members (March 2017). Our financial sources are strictly defined by law being allowed only income from members’ fees, collective actions, and subsidies from national / European/international public institutions. We also have 45 volunteers who on a permanent basis significantly contribute to our work.
EKPIZO is a pioneer in creating favorable jurisdiction for consumer, by using its legal right to go to the court on behalf of consumers; so far has filed 55 collective actions against over 80 private companies for misleading advertising-unfair contract terms-violation of the Consumer Protection Law. Their successful results allowed us to continue by filing class actions for our members whose collective redress is over 4 million euro so far.
EKPIZO is also a pioneer in Out of Court Dispute Settlement, having achieved so far the return to our members of over 17 million euro illegally withhold by companies.
Moreover, upon the economic crisis onset, we created a department for addressing overindebtedness and managed to give advice tailored to each of 15.000 individual members needs. In parallel, psychological support to members who needed it was offered by our volunteer psychologists.
We have carried out over 100 projects, mainly EU projects.
EKPIZO operates according to its principles which are: providing high quality services to consumers and bringing them into action; independence from political parties and economic interests; scientific knowledge and documentation of each issue as a precondition of the proper treatment; reliable, informed and accountable consumer information; objectivity and realism to our views and suggestions; cooperate with any private or governmental entity, which contributes to consumer protection.
EKPIZO is acknowledged as the mostly credible consumer association by public authorities, scientists, professionals and their organizations.
Our prioritized topics are: Financial Services, Consumer Rights, Energy, Digital Rights, and Food.
interests: Communication, Consumers, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Energy, Environment, Food Safety, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
